verses.verse: I made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with my eyes <WH5869>; why then should I think <WH995> upon a maid <WH1330>?

If I have seen <WH7200> any perish <WH6> for want of clothing <WH3830>, or any poor <WH34> without covering <WH3682>;
